inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing

inclusion.criterion: Pain visual analogue scale (VAS) of at least 20 mm in most days of the last month
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: American College of Rheumatology (ACR) functional class rating of I, II and III
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: examination shows bilateral swellings around the molars

inclusion.criterion: Relatively good health (0-2 according to the investigator's global assessment of disease status on a 5-point Likert scale)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum vitamin D level of >12.5 nmol/L and <60 nmol/L
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: His serum alkaline phosphatase is 300 IU/L

inclusion.criterion: Able to read, speak and understand English
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to co-operate with the study instructions
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to have knee MRIs performed

exclusion.criterion: Grade 3 radiographic changes in their knee
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The swellings are non-tender and attached to the underlying bone

exclusion.criterion: Severe knee pain (more than 80 mm on a 100-mm visual analogue scale,VAS) in most days of the last month
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contra-indications for having MRIs scans performed
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant trauma to the knees including arthroscopy or significant injury to ligaments or menisci of the knee within 1 year preceding the screening visit
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Anticipated need for knee or hip surgery in the next 2 years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Stomach or intestinal condition possibly affecting oral drug absorption
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant condition(s) such as (but not limited to) rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, lupus, active cancer, cardiac or renal function impairment or hypersensitivity to vitamin D
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be started on Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
